languages.text: "Годы назад они сказали, что я попаду в пыточную... Я все жду... Столько лет... Поскорее бы уже умереть!"
"Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"
languages.original_text: "Годы назад они сказали, что я попаду в пыточную... Я все жду... Столько лет... Поскорее бы уже умереть!"

traits.locale_text: "Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"
"Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"
"Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"
"Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"
"Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"

languages.text: “几年前，他们就说会把我丢进折磨室……我到现在还在等……这么多年过去了……我已经迫不及待地想死了！”
languages.original_text: "Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"

traits.locale_text: “几年前，他们就说会把我丢进折磨室……我到现在还在等……这么多年过去了……我已经迫不及待地想死了！”

languages.text: 「数年前、拷問部屋で死なせてやると言われた…まだその時は来ていないが…長い時間が経った…もう死を待つだけなんて嫌だ！」
languages.original_text: "Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"

traits.locale_text: 「数年前、拷問部屋で死なせてやると言われた…まだその時は来ていないが…長い時間が経った…もう死を待つだけなんて嫌だ！」

languages.text: « Il y a une éternité, on m'a dit que je finirais dans une salle de torture... J'attends toujours... Tant d'années se sont écoulées... J'ai hâte de mourir ! »
languages.original_text: "Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"

traits.locale_text: « Il y a une éternité, on m'a dit que je finirais dans une salle de torture... J'attends toujours... Tant d'années se sont écoulées... J'ai hâte de mourir ! »

languages.text: «Hace ya tiempo que me dijeron que acabaría en la sala de tortura... Y sigo esperando... Han pasado tantos años... ¡Ojalá me llegue mi hora!».
languages.original_text: "Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"

traits.locale_text: «Hace ya tiempo que me dijeron que acabaría en la sala de tortura... Y sigo esperando... Han pasado tantos años... ¡Ojalá me llegue mi hora!».

languages.text: "Vor Jahren sagten sie mir, ich würde in der Folterkammer enden ... Ich warte noch immer ... So viele Jahre sind vergangen ... Ich kann es kaum erwarten, zu sterben!"
languages.original_text: "Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"

traits.locale_text: "Vor Jahren sagten sie mir, ich würde in der Folterkammer enden ... Ich warte noch immer ... So viele Jahre sind vergangen ... Ich kann es kaum erwarten, zu sterben!"

languages.text: "Yıllar önce, bir işkence odasında ölüme kavuşacağımı söylediler. Hâlâ bekliyorum. Üzerinden çok yıl geçti. Ölmek için sabırsızlanıyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Years ago, they said I would end up in the torture chamber... I am still waiting... So many years have passed... I cannot wait to die!"

traits.locale_text: "Yıllar önce, sonumun bir işkence odasında geleceğini söylediler. Hâlâ bekliyorum. Üzerinden ne çok yıl geçti. Ölmek için sabırsızlanıyorum!"
